document.full_text: the israeli parliament overwhelmingly approved a near doubling of the profit tax on gas and oil extracted from israeli territory, a move expected to be worth tens of billions of dollars over the coming decades.
document.title: middle east: israel: doubling tax on energy
lines_and_colors: the israeli parliament overwhelmingly approved a near doubling of the profit tax on gas and oil extracted from israeli territory, a move expected to be worth tens of billions of dollars over the coming decades.
